text: Chakghat is a town and a nagar panchayat in Rewa district in the state of Madhya Pradesh, India. ==Demographics== India census, Chakghat NP had a population of 18,000. Males constitute 43% of the population and females 57%. 18% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Rewa district
title: Chakghat
